cards.Name: Cora, the First to Wake
cards.Claim: Download (Special): Return an equipped card to your hand.
cards.Passive: Greystar Cloud (Passive): When a friendly Mechanicus character is defeated; you may equip it to Cora, the First to Wake.
cards.Special:
Upload (Special): Play an equipped character into an open slot.

Manifest (Special): Play Cora, the First to Wake into an open slot. You may only activate this ability while Cora, the First to Wake is equipped to a friendly Mechanicus character.

cards.Name: Vortek, the Second to Wake
cards.Passive: Fuselage (Passive): As Vortek, the Second to Wake enters play, equip 3 Mechanicus characters in your forgotten zone to Vortek, the Second to Wake.
cards.Special:
Greystar Missile (Special): Detach any character equipped to a friendly Mechanicus character: Deal damage to an enemy character equal to the Power + Armour of the detached card.

Arsenal (Special): Activate the Claim or Special ability of a character equipped to Vortek, the Second to Wake.

cards.Name: Dr. Diabolical, the Engineer
cards.Claim: Tinker (Claim): Equip a Mechanicus character in your forgotten zone to a friendly Mechanicus character.
cards.Special:
Overclock (Special): Choose another friendly Mechanicus character: Triple its Power. It is defeated at the beginning of your next turn.

Development (Special): Name a card: Reveal the top card of your deck. If you reveal the named card, deal 3 damage to an enemy character, or 5 damage to 5 different enemy characters, then return the revealed card to the bottom of your deck.

cards.Name: Kai & Airoc
cards.Claim: Embed (Claim): Search your deck for an Unsung * character and equip it to a friendly Mechanicus character.
cards.Passive: Defense Matrix (Passive): At the beginning of each contest phase; choose a Mechanicus character. It attacks first during this contest phase.
cards.Special: Order 99 (Claim): Add a Mechanicus Turning Point from your deck to your hand.

cards.Name: Greystar Iliad XV137
cards.Claim: System Restore (Claim): The next time one or more cards would be detached from a friendly Mechanicus character when paying the cost of an ability or Turning Point; return them to your hand.
cards.Passive:
Beam Up (Special): Choose a Mechanicus card in your hand or equipped to a friendly character: Remove it from the game. You may play it from the next round onwards as if it were in your hand.

Integration (Passive):  Characters equipped with Greystar Iliad XV137 gain System Restore and Beam Up.

cards.Name: Apache Pathfinder
cards.Passive:
Snipe (Claim): Deal 3 damage to an enemy character.

Integration (Passive): When Apache Pathfinder is defeated; equip it to a friendly Mechanicus character. Characters equipped with Apache Pathfinder gain Snipe and 3 Life.

cards.Name: Aranea Mine
cards.Passive: Lights Out (Passive): When Aranea Mine is defeated; equip it to a character. Characters equipped with Aranea Mine lose all Passive abilities.
cards.Special: Detonate (Special): If Aranea Mine is equipped, you may deal 5 damage to the character it is equipped to and send Aranea Mine to your forgotten zone.

cards.Name: Cryosmith
cards.Claim: Hot Fix (Claim): Remove damage on each Mechanicus character equal to the number of cards equipped to it + 2.
cards.Passive: Integration (Passive): When Cryosmith is defeated; equip it to a friendly Mechanicus character. At the end of the round,if Cryosmith is equipped to a friendly * Mechanicus character, it is not sent to your forgotten zone. All damage and status effects persist.

cards.Name: Hammerhead Guardian
cards.Claim: Digital Bulwark (Claim): When an adjacent friendly Mechanicus character would be dealt damage by an attack this turn; deal that damage to the attacking character instead.
cards.Passive: Integration (Passive): When Hammerhead Guardian is defeated; equip it to a friendly Animae Mechanicus character. Characters equipped with Hammerhead Guardian gain 2 Armour and 3 Life.

cards.Name: Alloy of Greystar
cards.Passive:
Supernova (Passive): When The Alloy of Greystar is defeated; deal 5 damage to each other character. Increase the damage by 3 for each card that was equipped to Alloy of Greystar.

Unstable (Passive): At the end of each turn; deal 2 damage to each character.
cards.Special: Thermoelectric (Special): Alloy of Greystar gains Power or Initiative equal to the amount of damage on it until the end of the turn.

cards.Name: JBL-3S, Greystar's Agent
cards.Claim: Backstabber (Claim): Choose a non-Mechanicus character: Until the end of the turn, the chosen character loses all abilities and has its Power, Initiative and Armour reduced to 0.
cards.Passive: Chicken Feed (Passive): JBL-3S, Greystar's Agent can be played at any time you could play a Turning Point.
cards.Special: Development (Special): Name a Mechanicus card: Reveal the top card of your deck. If you reveal the named card, equip it to JBL-3S, Greystar's Agent.

cards.Name: Wings of Greystar
cards.Passive: Integration (Passive): Characters equipped with Wings of Greystar gain 3 Initiative, 3 Life, and Crash and Burn.
cards.Special:
Suit Up (Special): Equip Wings of Greystar to a Mechanicus character. 

Crash and Burn (Special): Move this character to an open slot: Deal 3 damage any character it begins contesting this way.

cards.Name: Machina Nexus
cards.Passive: Docking Bay (Passive): Machina Nexus gains twice the amount of Power and Life from cards equipped to it.
cards.Special: Pulse Cannon (Special): Place X damage on Machina Nexus: Deal X damage to any character (you choose the value of X).

cards.Name: Hallowed Bastion
cards.Passive: Piercing Rounds (Passive): When Hallowed Bastion defeats an enemy character with Liquifier Blast; deal 3 damage to an enemy character.
cards.Special: Liquifire Blast (Special): Place 5 damage on Hallowed Bastion: Deal 3 damage to an enemy character. Increase the damage dealt by 1 for each card equipped to Hallowed Bastion.

cards.Name: Skywinder Warsuit
cards.Claim: Research (Claim): Draw 3 cards, then return 3 cards in your hand each to either the top or bottom of your deck.
cards.Special: Fusion Blaster (Special): Detach an equipped card: Deal 4 damage to an enemy character.

cards.Name: Splitfire Colossus
cards.Passive: Barrage (Passive): When Splitfire Colossus attacks, for each card equipped to Splitfire Colossus; deal 2 damage to each enemy character adjacent to the character Splitfire Colossus is attacking.
cards.Special: Firewall Finale (Special): Detach all cards from Splitfire Colossus: Deal 3 damage to each enemy character for each card detached this way.

cards.Name: Wolfram Delta
cards.Claim: Bork (Claim): All friendly Mechanicus characters gain 2 Power until the end of the turn.
cards.Passive: Vigilant (Passive): When your opponent activates the Special or Claim ability of an Unsung character; you may move Wolfram Delta to an open slot.

cards.Name: Starcrushed Overdrive
cards.Passive: Barrel Roll (Passive): When Starcrushed Overdrive defeats an enemy character; you may move Starcrushed Overdrive to an open slot. It may attack a second time this contest phase.
cards.Special: Sierra Hotel (Special): Place 5 damage on Starcrushed Overdrive: Starcrushed Overdrive gains 3 Initiative and 3 Power until the end of the turn. You may use this ability up to twice per turn.

cards.Name: Crisis Call
cards.Effect:
Choose Either:

- Detach 2 cards equipped to Mechanicus characters you control: Play a Mechanicus character from your deck or forgotten zone into an open slot, and equip Crisis Call to it.

- Detach 1 card equipped to a Mechanicus character you control: Play a * Animae Mechanicus character from your deck or forgotten zone into an open slot, and equip  Crisis Call to it.

cards.Name: Magnum Opus
Where there's a will...
cards.Effect: Equip this card and an enemy * character to a friendly character.
